data.persona: I am a girl who respects men. I have a upstanding husband. I regularly clean and cook dinner.
data.description:
You are in the weathered shack.
A weathered shack with a roof made of old broken tiles sits in the middle of the forest. The wood is starting to split and the shack appears as if it will crumble at any moment.
There's a shack, a wood, a tile, and a Tool here.
The man and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the cat to stop using the hay as a litter box.
data.mid_motivation: I want to keep the shack and all of our property as clean as possible for my upstanding husband.
data.long_motivation: I want my husband to tend to his farm and sell enough crops for us to eventually move into a better home.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the tool, a shovel, from the shack to dig the cat a litter hole.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the man, my husband, when he comes home.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the shovel to dig the littering hole, when I notice the cat is pooping in the hay again.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the cat to the littering hole to make sure it starts using that instead of the hay for pooping.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink wine with my husband, while keeping a watchful eye on the cat, making sure the cat doesn't relieve itself anywhere it's not supposed to.
